description: Internet Computer Subaccount Indexer Library - TypeScript SDK for ICP multi-token subaccount management, transaction tracking, and automated sweeping with webhook support
rules: Use HttpAgent from @dfinity/agent for all canister calls
Always handle Result types with 'Ok' and 'Err' patterns
Use Tokens.ICP, Tokens.CKUSDC, Tokens.CKUSDT, Tokens.CKBTC for token types
Use bigint for amounts and intervals
Handle authentication with createHostAgentAndIdentityFromSeed or createHostAgentAndIdentityFromPrivateKey
